name: talk2GLOBE
text: [@roytang](https://twitter.com/roytang/) We understand how important it is to have a reliable internet connection, Roy. Send us a DM, or you can use the GlobeOne app's More section and look for the Help icon. It is downloadable via the Google Play Store, Huawei AppGallery, and App Store. Thanks. https://twitter.com/messages/compose?recipient_id=15092616
